Name: Tap Heroes
About the game: Welcome to the first puppet show RPG! Battle tons of foes, buy new upgrades, cast magic and recruit new Heroes. Or just sit back as your Heroes do the fighting while you relax or do other things. But just remember that you need to make sure your heroes are strong enough before you leave them to their own, especially if you are about to face a Boss! Enjoy the show! Features Over 70 different enemies and bosses 10 different areas A Distinct group of heroes with different abilities Interesting powers to unleash on your enemies Mix of RPG and clicker grind elements with tons of skills to upgrade Absolutely no microtransactions of any sort Possibly infinite gameplay Puppet stage graphics with cute puppet heroes!
